body: Mark notes that homosexuality in Uganda is not a European import: "The irony is that homosexuality existed here long before Europeans had ever set foot on the African continent and it is, in fact, Christianity, a true European import, that has demonized homosexuals."

title: Uganda: Homosexuality not a European concept

sentence: Mark notes that homosexuality in Uganda is not a European import: "The irony is that homosexuality existed here long before Europeans had ever set foot on the African continent and it is, in fact, Christianity, a true European import, that has demonized homosexuals."
